original_text: And the king said again unto Esther on the second day at the banquet of wine, What is thy petition, queen Esther? and it shall be granted thee: and what is thy request? and it shall be performed, even to the half of the kingdom.
korean_text: 왕이 이 둘째 날 잔치에 술을 마실 때에 다시 에스더에게 물어 이르되 왕후 에스더여 그대의 소청이 무엇이냐 곧 허락하겠노라 그대의 요구가 무엇이냐 곧 나라의 절반이라 할지라도 시행하겠노라

sentences.original_text: And the king said again unto Esther
on the second day at the banquet of wine
What is thy petition, queen Esther?
and it shall be granted thee:
even to the half of the kingdom.
